text: Lewis Wolpert CBE FRS FRSL FMedSci (19 October 1929 - 28 January 2021) was a South African-born British developmental biologist, author, and broadcaster. Wolpert was known for his work on the intracellular positional information that guides cellular development. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 1989. Wolpert died at a hospital in London on 28 January 2021 from COVID-19, aged 91.Humanists UK mourns Professor Lewis Wolpert CBE FRS (1929-2021) ==Publications== * * * Paperback First published 1992 by Faber & Faber, London. * * * * * ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in London Category:South African scientists Category:South African writers Category:British biologists Category:Scientists from London Category:Writers from London Category:Members of Academia Europaea
title: Lewis Wolpert
